name: farm
trans: vt. 养殖；耕种；佃出（土地）
vi. 种田，务农；经营农场

sentences.english: a 300-hectare farm
farm workers
farm animals
Joe had worked on the farm all his life.

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

sentences.english: She dickered with the farmer for the best fruit.
sentences.chinese: 她要买最好的水果而跟农民讨价还价。

sentences.english: The farmer peddled his fruit from house to house.
sentences.chinese: 那个农民挨家挨户兜售他的水果。

sentences.english: As a farmer, you should learn how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.chinese: 作为农民，你应该学会怎样把一对牛用轭连起来。

name: pig
trans: vi. 生小猪；像猪一样过活
n. 警察（俚语，带有攻击性）

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

sentences.english: Our cow is carrying again.
The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.english: The cow cast a calf.

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

sentences.english: Sheep were grazing on the hillside.
a sheep farmer

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal that is kept for its wool and its meat

name: a
trans: n. 字母A；第一流的；学业成绩达最高标准的评价符号

sentences.english: We have a problem.
There was a hole in the fence.
Suddenly they heard a loud bang.
sentences.chinese: 他们突然听到砰的一声巨响。

sentences.english: I get paid once a month.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资一个月发一次。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are talking about someone or something that has not been mentioned before, or that your listener does not know about

sentences.english: an orange
an X-ray

detailed_translations.english: used when the following word begins with a vowel sound

sentences.english: The police played an elaborate game of cat and mouse to trap him.
sentences.chinese: 警方跟他玩了一场精心布局的猫捉老鼠游戏，诱他落网。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with four legs that people often keep as a pet

name: dog
trans: n. 狗；丑女人；卑鄙的人；(俚)朋友

sentences.english: I could hear a dog barking .
He’s taken the dog for a walk .
We used to have a dog when I was young.
the most popular breed of dog

detailed_translations.english: a common animal with four legs, fur, and a tail. Dogs are kept as pets or trained to guard places, find drugs etc.

name: duck
trans: n. 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

name: fish
trans: vi. 捕鱼，钓鱼；用钩捞取

sentences.english: Over 1,500 different species of fish inhabit the waters around the reef.
sentences.chinese: 那片礁石周围的水域生活着1,500多种不同的鱼类。

sentences.english: The stonefish is the most deadly of all fishes.
sentences.chinese: 石鱼是所有鱼类中毒性最强的。

sentences.english: You usually drinks white wine with fish.
Dad really loves to fish.

detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, and uses its fins and tail to swim
to try to catch fish

name: bird
trans: vi. 猎鸟；观察研究野鸟

sentences.english: wild birds
The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
a wooden bird cage

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

sentences.english: furry little animals
The cosmetics have not been tested on animals.
sentences.chinese: 这些化妆品没有进行过动物试验。

sentences.english: Beth is an animal lover (=  someone who likes animals  ) .
sentences.chinese: 贝丝是个喜欢动物的人。

detailed_translations.english: a living creature such as a dog or cat, that is not an insect, plant, bird, fish, or person
human feelings, desires etc that are connected with sex, food, and other basic needs

name: horse
trans: n. 马；骑兵；脚架；海洛因
vt. 使骑马；系马于；捉弄

sentences.english: a horse and cart
Lee had never ridden a horse before.

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

sentences.english: ‘Would you like a sandwich?’ ‘Yes, please.’
sentences.chinese: “你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.chinese: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

detailed_translations.english: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

name: no
trans: abbr. 数字（number）；元素锘（nobelium）的符号

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

name: in
trans: prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内
n. 执政者；门路；知情者
adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
My mother was in the kitchen.
He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
a hole in the ground
Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
I never went in pubs.

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

name: on
trans: adv. 向前地；作用中，行动中；继续着
prep. 向，朝……；关于；在……之上；在……时候
adj. 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中

sentences.english: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.english: Matt kissed her on the cheek.

detailed_translations.english: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

trans: vt. 拳击；装…入盒中；打耳光

sentences.english: the jury box

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

name: zoo

sentences.english: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

sentences.english: The caged panda chafed against the bars.
sentences.chinese: 笼子里的大熊猫贴在栅栏上蹭它的身体。

sentences.english: No. If the panda  has not quit by morning .
sentences.chinese: 不，如果明天早上那熊猫还不走

detailed_translations.english: a large black and white animal that looks like a bear and lives in the mountains of China

sentences.english: The monkey is beating up and down.
The monkey engulfed the food whole.
sentences.chinese: 这只猴子囫囵吞下食物。

sentences.english: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这只猴子把花园中一整块地方的花都糟蹋了。

detailed_translations.english: a small brown animal with a long tail, which uses its hands to climb trees and lives in hot countries

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
So the part of the elephant I experience applies what we know about people and how we apply that to UX design.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我体验的那部分的大象就是我们对人的了解和我们将我们的了解应用于用户体验设计。

sentences.english: Tom: No.Although 75% of its raw materials is elephant dung, it is light delicate fragrance instead of stink. This is due to its special fabrication technology.
sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

detailed_translations.english: a very large grey animal with four legs, two tusks(= long curved teeth ) and a trunk(= long nose ) that it can use to pick things up

name: big
trans: adj. 大的；重要的；量大的
adv. 大量地；顺利；夸大地

sentences.english: a big house
I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: small
trans: n. 小件物品；矮小的人
adj. 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
a small car
a small town
a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.english: The T-shirt was too small for him.
sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.english: The sweater comes in three sizes - small, medium and large.
sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: Only a relatively small number of people were affected.
sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
A much smaller proportion of women are employed in senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.english: Or tiger ?

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family

name: bear
trans: vt. 忍受；承受；具有；支撑

sentences.english: a mother bear and her cubs

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal with thick fur, that eats flesh, fruit, and insects

name: long
trans: n. 长时间；[语] 长音节；（服装的）长尺寸；长裤
adj. 长的；过长的；做多头的；长时间的；冗长的，长音

sentences.english: He longed to see her again.
She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

name: short
trans: adj. 短的；不足的；矮的，低的

sentences.english: a short meeting
Morris gave a short laugh.
a short course on business English
Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

sentences.english: They had one daughter.
one hundred and twenty-one pounds
Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).
The children seemed upset. One was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子好像不开心，有一个在哭。

used to refer to a member of a group or pair of people or things

sentences.english: We’d better go. It’s almost three (= three o’clock ) .

sentences.english: Luke will soon be four (= four years old ) .

name: five
trans: n. 五，五个；五美元钞票

sentences.english: There is also a golf course five miles away.

sentences.english: I’ll be back by five (= five o’clock ) .

Keep off the grass.

detailed_translations.english: an area of grass, especially an area where the grass is kept cut short

The banana bears two crops every year.

sentences.chinese: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

detailed_translations.english: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it

sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

a few grains of rice

detailed_translations.english: a food that consists of small white or brown grains that you boil in water until they become soft enough to eat

name: chicken
trans: n. 鸡肉；小鸡；胆小鬼，懦夫
adj. 鸡肉的；胆怯的；幼小的

sentences.chinese: 莱昂内尔搭建了一个鸡笼，这样他们就可以养鸡，得到新鲜鸡蛋。

sentences.english: roast chicken

detailed_translations.english: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs

sentences.english: fresh fruit and vegetables
organic methods of growing vegetables
vegetable soup
a neat vegetable garden
Vitamin A is found in liver and green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 动物肝脏和绿色蔬菜中含有维生素A。

detailed_translations.english: a plant that is eaten raw or cooked, such as a cabbage, a carrot, or peas
relating to plants in general, rather than animals or things that are not living

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
fruit and vegetables
a glass of fruit juice
a large garden with fruit trees
I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: like
trans: n. 爱好；同样的人或物

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
I like my coffee quite weak.
I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
Would you like a drink?

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

name: good
trans: n. 好处；善行；慷慨的行为
adj. 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的

sentences.english: a good hotel
good quality cloth
The train service is not very good.
My French is better than my Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 我的法语比西班牙语好。

sentences.english: Alex is very good at languages.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯在语言方面很擅长。

sentences.english: She’s a very good player.
sentences.chinese: 她是一名非常优秀的球员。

detailed_translations.english: of a high standard or quality

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
Would you like some milk in your tea?
a pint of semi-skimmed milk
I helped to milk the cows.

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
an ostrich egg
The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

sentences.english: Would you like some bread with your soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喝汤时要吃点面包吗？

sentences.english: a loaf of brown bread
a piece of bread and butter

detailed_translations.english: a type of food made from flour and water that is mixed together and then baked

name: apple
trans: n. 苹果，苹果树，苹果似的东西；[美俚]炸弹，手榴弹，（棒球的）球；[美俚]人，家伙。

sentences.english: apple pie
an apple tree
roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )

detailed_translations.english: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside

sentences.english: orange juice
orange peel
Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: She was sent to jail for eleven months.
I never go to bed before eleven (= 11 o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 我从不在11点钟以前上床睡觉。

sentences.english: James had worked every summer since he was eleven (= 11 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯自11岁起每年夏天都打工。

detailed_translations.english: the number
the number

sentences.english: He received a twelve-month jail sentence.
Come at twelve (= 12 o’clock ) .
Their son Dylan is twelve (= 12 years old ) .

detailed_translations.english: the number 12
the number 12

name: thirteen
trans: n. 十三；十三岁；十三个

sentences.english: They’ve only sold thirteen tickets so far.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止他们仅仅售出13张票。

sentences.english: When it happened, I was thirteen (= 13 years old ) .

detailed_translations.english: the number 13
the number 13

name: fourteen
trans: num. 十四；十四个；第十四
n. 十四的记号；十四岁；十四点钟；十五世纪

sentences.english: He used to work fourteen hours a day.
sentences.chinese: 他过去一天工作14个小时。

sentences.english: I started playing the guitar when I was fourteen (= 14 years old ) .

detailed_translations.english: the number 14

detailed_translations.chinese: 十四的记号；十四岁；十四点钟；十五世纪
detailed_translations.english: the number 14

name: fifteen
trans: n. 十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队

sentences.english: a coastal village fifteen miles south of Tourane
sentences.chinese: 土伦以南15英里的一个滨海村落

sentences.english: They met when she was fifteen (= 15 years old ) .

detailed_translations.chinese: 十五；十五个；十五人组成的橄榄球队
detailed_translations.english: the number 15
the number 15

sentences.english: I like ice cream and cookies as much as the next guy. But I hate how it makes me feel afterward.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冰淇淋和曲奇，但我又讨厌吃完之后所带给我的感受，疲倦，瞌睡，精力不集中等等。

sentences.english: If you enjoy chocolate ice cream, as I do, when confronted with a tub of it would you also enjoy eating as much of the tub as possible?
sentences.chinese: 如果你像我一样喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋，那么当你面前放着一桶这样的冰淇淋时，你是否会敞开肚子尽量多吃呢？

sentences.english: On the morning of the stroke, I woke up to a pounding pain behind my left eye. And it was the kind of pain, caustic pain, that you get when you bite into ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那 天早上，我从睡梦中醒来，发现自己的左脑疼痛不止，那种痛楚跟你咬冰淇淋的那种腐蚀性的感觉一样，它抓住我，然后又放开，然后再次抓住，再次放开。

sentences.english: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

detailed_translations.english: the number

name: seventeen
trans: adj. 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的

sentences.english: a group of seventeen American military officers
sentences.chinese: 由17名美国军官组成的团体

sentences.english: I left home when I was seventeen (= 17 years old ) .

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

detailed_translations.chinese: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

sentences.english: At least eighteen bullets were fired.
Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).

detailed_translations.english: the number 18
the number 18

sentences.english: It was nineteen minutes past seven.
I was only nineteen (= 19 years old ).

detailed_translations.english: the number 19

sentences.english: a small village twenty miles from Nairobi
sentences.chinese: 距内罗毕20英里的一个小村庄

sentences.english: I’m nearly twenty (= 20 years old ) .

detailed_translations.english: the number 20
the number 20

name: please
trans: vt. 使喜欢；使高兴，使满意
vi. 讨人喜欢；令人高兴

sentences.english: a business that wants to please its customers
sentences.chinese: 希望让顾客满意的一家公司

sentences.english: She did everything she could to please him.
Most children are eager to please .
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都渴望取悦别人。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone happy or satisfied

sentences.english: Joe got up and left without a word of thanks .
sentences.chinese: 乔起身离开了，一句感谢的话也没有说。

sentences.english: ‘Pass the salt, please…thanks.’

detailed_translations.english: used to tell someone that you are grateful for something they have given you or done for you
the things you say or do to show that you are grateful to someone

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
